div.pre: 808 Roksolany (anc. Niconium), Ovidio- pol' raion, Odessa oblast, Ukraine, 1960 Burial: 350-300 B.C. (Golenko) Contents: 6 AE Tyra: (as AMNG I.1, pl. 12, 11) Disposition: Odessa Ashrafian, Kratkie Soobshcheniia Odesskogo Go- sudarstvennogo Arkheologicheskogo Muzeia 1961 (Odessa, 1963), p. 100 â€ Zaginailo, MASP 5 (1966), pp. 103, 122, nos. 113-8
